subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hindi: राजस्थान के लिए उपस्थान की राजधानी क्या है?
explanation_hindi_answer: जयपुर राजस्थान के लिए उपस्थान की राजधानी है।
explanation_hindi: राजस्थान के लिए उपस्थान की राजधानी है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_hi: राजस्थान देश कब बन्याबात्र्याबाबातिक राजधानी है।
explanation_hi: राजस्थान देश 1956 मेंट मिल गया गया।
explanation_hindi: राजस्थान देश 1956 मेंट मिल गी गया गया।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which language is predominantly spoken in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Hindi and Marwari are the major languages spoken in Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajasthan ruler was known as "Raja"?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh, also known as Raja, was a famous Rajput ruler from Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_en: The 1st Rajasthan ruler was Ashok Shah, who reigned during 1935 CE
